SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.client

Interface UI

All Superinterfaces:
ViewSubject
All Known Implementing Classes:
GUI, TextualUI
public interface UI extends ViewSubject
The UI interface represents the user interface component of the application. It extends the ViewSubject interface. It provides methods for updating various UI components and running the game.
